00063         {
00064                 NextElement = NULL;

00210 template <typename TYPE>
00211 MemoryList<TYPE>::MemoryList()
00212 {
00213         // There is nothing in the list
00214         NumberOfElements = 0;
00215         Head = NULL;
00216         Tail = NULL;
00217 
00218         // There is no position at all
00219         PreviousElement = NULL;
00220         CurrentElement = NULL;
00221         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00222 }

00225 MemoryList<TYPE>::~MemoryList()
00226 {
00227         Empty();

00230 // Access fonction
00231 template <typename TYPE>
00232 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::Add( const TYPE& Val )
00233 {
00234         SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00235         if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00236                 return false;
00237 
00238         tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00239         if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00240         {
00241                 Tail =  Head = tmp;
00242         }
00243         else
00244         {
00245                 // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00246                 Tail->NextElement = tmp;
00247                 Tail = tmp;
00248 
00249                 //if ( Head->NextElement == NULL )
00250                 //{
00251                 //      Head->NextElement = tmp;
00252                 //}
00253         }
00254 
00255         // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00256         NumberOfElements++;
00257 
00258         // Tout est ok
00259         return true;
00260 }
00261 
00266 template <typename TYPE>
00267 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::AddHead( const TYPE& Val )
00268 {
00269         SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00270         if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00271                 return false;
00272 
00273         tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00274         if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00275         {
00276                 Tail =  Head = tmp;
00277         }
00278         else
00279         {
00280                 // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00281                 // Head->NextElement = tmp;
00282                 tmp->NextElement = Head;
00283                 Head = tmp;
00284         }
00285 
00286         // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00287         NumberOfElements++;
00288 
00289         // Tout est ok
00290         return true;
00291 }

00297 template <typename TYPE>
00298 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::AddTail( const TYPE& Val )
00299 {
00300         // just call the add function
00301         return Add(Val);
00302 }

00310 // Set position to the first element
00311 template <typename TYPE>
00312 void MemoryList<TYPE>::First()
00313 {
00314         PreviousElement = NULL;
00315         CurrentElement = Head;
00316         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00317 }
00318 
00319 // Set position to the next element
00320 template <typename TYPE>
00321 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::Next()
00322 {
00323         // Ok, we do not have any other element
00324         if ( CurrentElement == NULL ){
00325                 RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00326                 return false;
00327         }
00328 
00329         //seb
00330         if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured){
00331                 RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00332                 // Previous and Current have already the good value
00333                 return true;
00334         }
00335                 
00336         // Here we can go forward in the list
00337         PreviousElement = CurrentElement;
00338         CurrentElement  = CurrentElement->NextElement;
00339 
00340         // Have we reach the end of the list ?
00341         if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00342         {
00343                 return false;
00344         }
00345 
00346         return true;
00347 }
00348 
00349 // Set position to the next element
00350 template <typename TYPE>
00351 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::AtEnd() const
00352 {
00353         // Ok, we do not have any other element
00354         if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00355                 return true;
00356 
00357         return false;
00358 }
00359 
00360 // Set position to the next element
00361 template <typename TYPE>
00362 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::NotAtEnd() const
00363 {
00364         // Ok, we do not have any other element
00365         if ( CurrentElement != NULL )
00366                 return true;
00367 
00368         return false;
00369 }
00370 
00371 // Get the current element of the list
00372 template <typename TYPE>
00373 TYPE& MemoryList<TYPE>::GetCurrent() const
00374 {
00375         if ( RemoveCurrentHasOccured )
00376                 throw  SimpleException("RemoveCurrentHasOccured");
00377 
00378         return CurrentElement->ElementContainer;
00379 }
00380 
00381 // Remove the current element
00382 template <typename TYPE>
00383 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::RemoveCurrent()
00384 {
00385         if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00386                 throw  SimpleException("RemoveCurrentHasOccured");
00387 
00388         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = true;
00389         SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = CurrentElement;
00390 
00391         if ( tmp == NULL )
00392         {
00393                 // We must call at least First on a non empty list
00394                 return false;
00395         }
00396 
00397         // Here we have a current element...
00398         // Are we at the begining of the MemoryList ?
00399         if ( Head == tmp )
00400         {
00401                 // Yes, wa are !
00402                 Head = tmp->NextElement;
00403 
00404                 // PreviousElement remains the same : 
00405                 // PreviousElement == NULL
00406 
00407                 // The new current element if the next in the list, so the head
00408                 CurrentElement = Head;
00409         }
00410         else
00411         {
00412                 // We are not at the begining of the list
00413                 // Here we can remove directly the element within the list
00414                 tmp = CurrentElement;
00415                 PreviousElement->NextElement = tmp->NextElement;
00416                 CurrentElement = tmp->NextElement;
00417         }
00418 
00419         // Was the element the last item of the list ?
00420         if ( Tail == tmp )
00421         {
00422                 // We have remove the last item of the list
00423                 Tail = PreviousElement;
00424         }
00425 
00426         // Delete the old current element
00427          ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00428 
00429         // Change the element count
00430         NumberOfElements--;
00431 
00432         return true;
00433 }
00434 
00435 // Remove a specific element
00436 template <typename TYPE>
00437 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::Remove(const TYPE& Element)
00438 {
00439         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00440         {
00441                 if ( GetCurrent() == Element )
00442                 {
00443                         RemoveCurrent();
00444                         return true;
00445                 }
00446         }
00447         return false;
00448 }
00449 
00450 template <typename TYPE>
00451 void MemoryList<TYPE>::Empty()
00452 {
00453         SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp;
00454         // On libere tous les elements de la liste
00455         while( Head != NULL )
00456         {
00457                 tmp = Head;
00458                 Head = Head->NextElement; // On dechaine le premier element
00459                 ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00460                 NumberOfElements--; // Non obligatoire !
00461         }
00462 }
00463 
00464 template <typename TYPE>
00465 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::IsEmpty() const
00466 { return Head == NULL; }
00467 
00468 template <typename TYPE>
00469 bool MemoryList<TYPE>::IsNotEmpty() const
00470 { return Head != NULL; }
00471 
00472 template <typename TYPE>
00473 TYPE MemoryList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst()
00474 {
00475   if(IsEmpty())
00476     throw SimpleListException("MemoryList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst : Forbidden when the list is empty");
00477 
00478   SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt = Head;
00479   if(Head == Tail)
00480     {
00481       Head = NULL; Tail = NULL;
00482     }else{
00483       Head = elt->NextElement;
00484     }
00485   NumberOfElements--;
00486 
00487   TYPE tmp = elt->ElementContainer;
00488   ReleaseSimpleListElement(elt);
00489   return tmp;
00490 }

00492 template <typename TYPE>
00493 SimpleListElement<TYPE>*  MemoryList<TYPE>::GetNewSimpleListElement() const
00494 { return new SimpleListElement<TYPE>; }
00495 
00496 template <typename TYPE>
00497 void MemoryList<TYPE>::ReleaseSimpleListElement(SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt) const
00498 { delete elt; }

00507 typedef enum TrackMemoryValues{
00508         FileNameSize = 255,
00509         TemporaryBufferSize = 4*1024-1  // 4 Kb - 1 byte
00510 };

00514 static bool Tracking = false;
00515 
00516 class MemoryBlockInfos
00517 {
00518 public:
00519         char    Filename[FileNameSize+1];
00520         void*   Where;
00521         size_t  Size;
00522         int             Line;
00523         MemoryBlockInfos * Next;
00524 
00525         MemoryBlockInfos()
00526         {
00527                 Filename[0] = '\0';
00528                 Where = NULL;
00529                 Size = 0;
00530                 Line = -1;
00531                 Next = NULL;
00532         }
00533 };

00545 void * operator new( size_t size, int line, const char *file )
00546 {
00547         void *ptr = (void *)malloc(size);
00548         Omiscid::AddMemoryBlock(ptr, size, file, line);
00549         return(ptr);
00550 }

00552 void * operator new[]( size_t size, int line, const char *file )
00553 {
00554         void *ptr = (void *)malloc(size);
00555         Omiscid::AddMemoryBlock(ptr, size, file, line);
00556         return(ptr);
00557 }

00581 void Omiscid::AddMemoryBlock(void* addr,  size_t aSize,  const char *fname, int lnum)
00582 {
00583         MemoryBlockInfos *info;
00584 
00585         if ( Tracking == false )
00586         {
00587                 return;
00588         }
00589 
00590         info = new MemoryBlockInfos;
00591 
00592         if ( info == NULL )
00593         {
00594                 // Could not allocate list, disable tracking
00595                 Tracking = false;
00596                 return;
00597 
00598         }
00599 
00600         // Fill information
00601         info->Where = addr;
00602         strncpy( info->Filename, fname, FileNameSize-1 );
00603         info->Filename[FileNameSize-1];
00604         info->Line = lnum;
00605         info->Size = aSize;
00606         
00607         // Add head
00608         AllocList.AddTail( info );
00609 }
00610 
00611 void Omiscid::RemoveMemoryBlock(void* addr)
00612 {
00613         for( AllocList.First(); AllocList.NotAtEnd(); AllocList.Next() )
00614         {
00615                 if( AllocList.GetCurrent()->Where == addr )
00616                 {
00617                         AllocList.RemoveCurrent();
00618                         break;
00619                 }
00620         }
00621 }
00622 
00623 static char * Omiscid::PrintSize( unsigned int SizeOfData )
00624 {
00625         if ( SizeOfData < 1024 )
00626         {
00627                 snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%d bytes", SizeOfData);
00628         }
00629         else if ( SizeOfData < 1024*1024 )
00630         {
00631                 snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Kbytes", (float)SizeOfData/1024.0f);
00632         }
00633         else if ( SizeOfData < 1024*1024*1024 )
00634         {
00635                 snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Mbytes", (float)SizeOfData/(1024.0f*1024.0f));
00636         }
00637         else // totalSize >= 1024*1024*1024*1024
00638         {
00639                 snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Gbytes", (float)SizeOfData/(1024.0f*1024.0f*1024.0f));
00640         }
00641 
00642         return WriteSizeBuffer;
00643 }
00644 
00645 void Omiscid::DumpUnfreed()
00646 {
00647         unsigned int TotalSize = 0;
00648         unsigned int NbBlocks = 0;
00649         char buf[TemporaryBufferSize+1];           
00650 
00651         if ( AllocList.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00652         {
00653                 return;
00654         }
00655 
00656         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00657         OutputDebugString(buf);
00658 
00659         MemoryBlockInfos * pTmp;
00660 
00661         for( AllocList.First(); AllocList.NotAtEnd(); AllocList.Next() )
00662         {
00663                 NbBlocks++;
00664 
00665                 pTmp = AllocList.GetCurrent();
00666 
00667                 // Visual studio compliant output (you can click on it to see the rigth line
00668                 snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "%s(%d) : %s unfreed memory at address %p\n", pTmp->Filename, pTmp->Line, PrintSize((unsigned int)pTmp->Size), pTmp->Where );
00669                 OutputDebugString(buf);
00670 
00671                 void * tmpv = pTmp->Where;
00672                 char * tmpc = (char*)tmpv;
00673                 int lSize = (int)pTmp->Size;
00674                 for( int j = 0; j < lSize && j < 20; j++)
00675                 {
00676                         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "%c", tmpc[j] );
00677                         OutputDebugString(buf);
00678                 }
00679                 snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "\n" );
00680                 OutputDebugString(buf);
00681 
00682                 TotalSize += (unsigned int)lSize;
00683         }
00684 
00685         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00686         OutputDebugString(buf);
00687         
00688         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "Total memory unfreed %s (%u allocated blocks).\n", PrintSize(TotalSize), NbBlocks );
00689         OutputDebugString(buf);
00690 
00691         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00692         OutputDebugString(buf);
00693 
00694         // Free the memory
00695         for( AllocList.First(); AllocList.NotAtEnd(); AllocList.Next() )
00696         {
00697                 delete AllocList.GetCurrent();
00698         }
00699 }
